title: [GAMEPLAY] Vladimir 'e' broken
body: Vlad's e doesn't hit all champions/minions that are in range of the e. Not sure how to add video but definitely was constantly happening.

replies.body: Were people in the way of each other?

It's not going to hit all champs and minions in range of E, it's not supposed to.'


Let me use maokai ult as a example, after it hits one person, it disappears... same concept for vlad's E.

Or ashe W.

yes, cause enemies can block instances of it.

it will only hit the first enemy in every direction, but not enemies that stand behind other enemies.

i think that even stands in the description of the ability.
